name: Casino Infinity

verdict.text: Casino Infinity has established itself as a comprehensive online casino offering a diverse selection of slots, table games, live dealer games, and instant win options from providers like [Provider names - information not available]. The platform excels in its vast game library, rewarding VIP program, and variety of secure payment options including cryptocurrency support.  Their licensing from Curacao ensures regulatory compliance and a degree of player protection, while their security measures include SSL encryption. The casino's bonus structure features a generous welcome bonus of 100% up to ‚Ç¨500 plus 200 free spins, along with ongoing promotions such as weekend reloads and free spins bonuses, though players should note the specific terms and conditions. Payment processing is handled through various methods including credit cards, e-wallets, and cryptocurrencies, with withdrawals typically completed within 1-3 business days. Mobile compatibility is available through a mobile-friendly website, allowing for gameplay on various devices. While Casino Infinity impresses with its extensive game selection and rewarding promotions, areas for improvement include clarifying mobile app availability and providing more detailed information on responsible gambling tools. Customer support is available 24/7 via live chat and email, though response times for email inquiries may vary. For the most current information about games, promotions, and services, visit https://casinoinfinity.com.

security.title: Is Casino Infinity Safe?
security.description: Casino Infinity operates under a Curacao license, providing a basic level of regulatory oversight.  The casino employs SSL encryption to protect user data during transmission.  Responsible gambling tools are available, including self-assessment tests and the option to set limits or self-exclude by contacting customer support. Payment security measures include standard encryption protocols for transactions. Specific details on third-party certifications, audits, data protection compliance (GDPR), player protection policies, account security features beyond email verification, and banking security measures are not readily available.  Players are advised to contact customer support or consult the casino's terms and conditions for further information on security practices and responsible gaming.

advantages: Extensive game selection with over 7,900 titles caters to diverse player preferences.
Rewarding VIP program offers exclusive bonuses, cashback, and increased withdrawal limits.
Secure payment options, including cryptocurrency support, provide flexibility and convenience.
24/7 customer support via live chat and email ensures assistance is readily available.
Mobile-friendly website enables gameplay across various devices.
Commitment to responsible gambling with self-assessment tools and self-exclusion options.
disadvantages: Limited information available regarding specific responsible gambling tools and their implementation.
Clarity needed on mobile app availability and functionality.
Specific details on payment processing times and fees could be more transparent.
Further details on security measures and third-party certifications would enhance trust.
More information on bonus terms and wagering requirements would be beneficial.
Additional details on customer support response times for email inquiries would be helpful.

faq.question: Is Casino Infinity legitimate?
faq.answer: Casino Infinity operates under a Curacao license, indicating a level of regulatory compliance.  However, players should research the reputation and credibility of the licensing authority.  Further information on the casino's ownership, security measures, and responsible gambling practices can be found on their website or by contacting customer support. It is recommended to check player reviews and forums for additional insights into the casino's legitimacy and player experiences.

faq.question: How long do withdrawals take at Casino Infinity?
faq.answer: Withdrawals at Casino Infinity typically take 1-3 business days to process.  However, the exact timeframe may vary depending on the chosen payment method and the player's VIP status. Players can contact customer support for more specific information on withdrawal processing times for their preferred payment method.  Additional details on withdrawal limits and potential fees can be found in the casino's terms and conditions or by contacting customer support.

faq.answer: Casino Infinity offers a range of payment methods, including traditional options like credit/debit cards and e-wallets, as well as cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Litecoin, and Ripple.  The minimum deposit is ‚Ç¨20, and the minimum withdrawal is ‚Ç¨30.  Withdrawal limits may vary based on VIP status.
